extendedInfo.description: Live a life you'll loveâ¦go to the hottest parties, meet new friends, and date celebrities. Build up your wardrobe by shopping at the most fashionable stores, then show off your glamorous new clothes at the club. Pursue your own dreams with a career as a model, actor or singer! Become a top guy or top girl in your hot career! Party with REAL players. You'll live a fabulous life in Love Life! Download this fashion game for guys and girls NOW for FREE! - Customize your look with the hottest fashion. Go shopping at 5 different stores and choose from 500+ dresses, shirts, purses, shoes, and accessories!- Visit the salon and get a makeover! Choose from over 20 different hair styles! Dye your hair with 8 possible colors!- Feeling tired? Visit the Cafe for an energy boost from coffee or an iced latte!- Select one of THREE possible glamorous careers! Become a model, actor/actress, or singer! Earn your place on the red carpet and become a superstar idol! You might be chased by paparazzi!- Hang out at the coolest nightclubs. Make friends with REAL players and flirt with guys & girls! Become a VIP!- Find a BOYFRIEND or GIRLFRIEND and go out on dates! Kiss, sing, and talk to your boyfriend/girlfriend to upgrade your relationship!- Play WITH FRIENDS: add your Facebook friends to play! Invite friends via email! Hang out with friends at the movies or the mall!- Android tablets supported! - Fame is here! Vote hot or not on other player's looks and fashion! Follow us on TWITTER: @dreamheartgamesNote: for Love Life 1 users, if you have any issues with syncing, please visit our forums so we can help you directly or email us. http://www.dreamheartgames.com/forums/

reviews.title: I got 1 and 2
reviews.comment: I love this phone so much I\'m playing both versions. I love them both they are great when to dreamHeart games for making an awesome game with no glitches.
reviews.author: Jill Febres

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I love this game but could use some help. Anyone who can help me or be my friend on here would be great. User... Ashleycook87
reviews.author: Ashley Cook

reviews.title: Help!
reviews.comment: Help me plz, i\'m a newbie here and I can\'t go to the party place it says something wrong with my connection but I checked it and there\'s nothing wrong with it and I still can\'t open the party place. What should I do?
reviews.author: Amanda Ramli

reviews.title: Won\'t download
reviews.comment: I downloaded the first one and decided to give the second one a try. When I went to download it, it took like forever to download!! I haven\'t even gotten a chance to play the dang game because it hasn\'t installed yet!! Its been like 10 minutes!!!
reviews.author: Daisy Bearer

reviews.title: Addictive!
reviews.comment: This game is very addictive and fun :) My only problem with it is that you run out of coins, cash, and energy so fast that you can\'t play the game longer than a few minutes. It would be awesome if the game didn\'t make it to where you almost have to pay to play for longer periods of time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice but need some help
reviews.comment: Its a really cool game guyz , but I only just started and whenever I go to a party , there\'s no one there , I want some friends :-(
reviews.author: Kainaat Bi

reviews.title: Don\'t get this game
reviews.comment: How can I get a bf ! The only option its to buy him a drink ! If I do they\'ll say im trying to get him drunk t\'f -.-
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This game is awsome b cuz u get the choice to pick who you want to b with. However you have to spend a load of coins. Also this game is like top girl or roman dating except better
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Its ok but sometimes it will freeze or not even show anything or even show parts if I could give it a zero I would it needs twobe updated on everything
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but needs improvement
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t show any other users, all I can do is buy clothes, do career, and change clothes. Would be great if those were fixed.
reviews.author: Alysa Lee

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: You can only advance so far in your career, game challenges, and relationship, and your friends relationships don\'t do anything for you. The game is challenging at all or even enough just to pass the time...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: REAL BAD PROBLEM
reviews.comment: Please make it to where u don\'t have to add anyone. We should b able to do this without adding people. What\'s the point in playing when its only you. Its a good game but I like to play without having to add people. Would b nice if we get a list of people and maybe get to pick the city to control the area. But chose who we want to invite without having to b forced to send out invites. Something like that. Will rate better.
reviews.author: Jessica Daniels

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: It was alright at the start, but now I can\'t date my boyfriend, and I can\'t enter fame.fix, and I will rate again.but for the time being, its only a 1 star.
reviews.author: Emma Daughton

reviews.title: My Character
reviews.comment: I can only see less than half of my character, its a good game but I would like to see my entire character
reviews.author: Sarah Braddock

reviews.title: Hate hate hate
reviews.comment: I hate this game no matter what
reviews.author: Celina Landers

reviews.title: Same old
reviews.comment: Basically just Top Girl. Don\'t download if u have either Top Girl or It Girl cos its just the same!
reviews.author: Casey Spencer

reviews.title: Fun, but bugs need fixing
reviews.comment: I love this game...it\'s addicting! The only downfall is that getting cash is pretty impossible and when I vote, I don\'t get my coins for it...I voted a lot too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ughhh
reviews.comment: I had love life 1 & 2 and on both of dem u can only see half the body and it always freezes up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: It\'s cool, but i can\'t meet people at a party every time I go to a club and right now it\'s pure, I\'m alone.i want to meet people.of not fixed soon I\'m going to have to delete both love life 1 and 2 please help me
reviews.author: Kayla Brandi

reviews.title: 2 crappy
reviews.comment: Everytime i try 2 view something it takes hours 2 load that im not bothered 2 wait! I am uninstalling this straight away! DONT DOWNLOAD!WASTE OF TIME! SOMEBODY MUST FIX AND IMPROVE THIS STRAIGHT AWAY!
reviews.author: juanpaulo Ladinez
